column4: on apache, i'm trying to set some options for several dirs at once but it won't work, i tried <Directory ~ "/var/www/drupal(.*)"> and also DirectoryMatch but without success... what am i doing wrong?
I think apache runs as its own user. You want to use a full path to your home dir, instead of ~.... I think.
on the Directory directive ~ means regex instead of unix dir name (notice the space between the actual folder expression and the ~, but thanks anyway
